name: GE HEALTHCARE
description: Provider of technologies, digital infrastructure, data analytics, related healthcare tools
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the ability to maintain, create and advance healthcare technologies in the United States.
H.R. 1865 - Further Consolidated Appropriations Bill for FY 2020- policies focused on device tax and new technologies for the diagnosis and potential treatment of Alzheimer's disease.

H.R. 748 - CARES Act - Issues related to supporting the national work fighting COVID-19 and increasing capacity for needed equipment.

H.R. 6201 - Families First Coronavirus Response Act -  Issues related to ensuring that the federal government is best supporting programs to allow states and localities to best support and equip hospitals and health care providers fight COVID-19.

H.R. 6074 - Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act of 2020 - Issues related to supporting programs and institutions supporting during the current pandemic.

HR 2882 - Further Consolidation Appropriations- Support for critical government programs remaining operational and available. HR 4366 - Consolidated Appropriations Act of FY 2024 and other Extensions Act - Support for critical government programs remaining operational and available. H.R. 7024 - Tax Relief for American Families and Workers Act of 2024 - Issues related to the R&D tax credit and other tax treatments to support job creation and innovation. Regulations, guidance and other activity related to artificial intelligence and health care. Regulations, guidance and other activity related to women's health care and research. Rules and regulations regarding the availability of diagnostic treatments and testing related to neurological disorders. S. 1544 - Facilitating Innovative Nuclear Diagnostics Act of 2023 - A bill to ensure that there is equitable and accessible coverage of radio-diagnostic treatments to detect diseases like Alzheimer's and Parkinson's across the country. Issues related to ensuring access to real time hospital data during national emergencies and pandemics for physicians and relevant health care personnel. Issues related to ensuring rural, underserved and other communities access to certain procedures and related drugs used to diagnose neurological disorders, such as Parkinson's disease. Issues related to women's health specific to access to imaging and other procedures used to assess the health of breasts and other organs. Issues related to ensuring access to cancer screening and treatments.

H.R. 1199 - Facilitating Innovative Nuclear Diagnostics Act (The FIND Act) - Issues related to ensuring access to diagnostic testing for neurological disorders, cancer and other diseases requiring PET scans for accurate diagnosis.
